name: haxepunk-gui
description: HaxePunk GUI is a toolset to display user interfaces that works with HaxePunk engine. It provide some basic components to allow the user to interact with the game.
releasenote: HaxePunk 2.4.1 (haxe3 + openfl) support, Full changelog at https://bitbucket.org/Lythom/haxepunk-gui#4-versions
